sentences.en: A copy of the report is available for you to peruse at your leisure.
sentences.cn: 现有一份报告，供你闲暇时细读。

sentences.en: For the greatest part of what we say and do being unnecessary, if a man takes this away, he will have more leisure and less uneasiness.
sentences.cn: 因为我们所说和所做的绝大部分事情都是不必要的，一个人如果取消它们，他将有更多的闲暇和较少的不适。

sentences.en: He could read all the national papers at his leisure.
sentences.cn: 他可以悠然阅读所有的全国性报纸。

sentences.en: He likes leisure and hates work.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢安逸,讨厌工作.

sentences.en: He read books at his leisure.
sentences.cn: 他在空闲时读一些书.

sentences.en: How do you usually spend your leisure time?
sentences.cn: 你通常是怎样度过你的空闲时间？

sentences.en: I am seldom at leisure.
sentences.cn: 我很少有空.

sentences.en: I'll return the call at my leisure.
sentences.cn: 我有空就会来拜访

sentences.en: It was hard to draw clear lines of demarcation between work and leisure.
sentences.cn: 在工作和闲暇之间很难划出明确的界限。

sentences.en: Life today is rigidly compartmentalized into work and leisure.
sentences.cn: 当今的生活被严格划分为工作和休闲两部分。

sentences.en: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.cn: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.en: On the whole, people miss the opportunity to enjoy leisure.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，人们渴望享受闲暇的时光。

sentences.en: The decor was reminiscent of a municipal arts-and-leisure centre.
sentences.cn: 这种布置让人想起都市里的艺术休闲中心。

sentences.en: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.cn: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.en: The hour-long sessions take place at Bloxwich Leisure Centre.
sentences.cn: 课时长为1小时的课程开设在布洛克斯威奇康乐中心。

sentences.en: The Leisure Center is a long and low modern building.
sentences.cn: 休闲中心是一座狭长而低矮的现代建筑。

sentences.en: The leisure facilities are there for the use of guests.
sentences.cn: 这些休闲设施是供客人使用的。

sentences.en: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.cn: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.en: the need to improve facilities for leisure and recreation
sentences.cn: 改进消遣娱乐设施之必要

sentences.en: the poems were left for others to read at leisure.
sentences.cn: 这些诗是留给别人慢慢去读的。

sentences.en: the rest of the day can be spent at leisure.
sentences.cn: 这天剩下的时间可以轻松度过了。

sentences.en: to upgrade the town's leisure facilities
sentences.cn: 改善镇里的休闲设施

sentences.en: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.cn: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.en: You will have full use of all the new leisure club facilities.
sentences.cn: 你可以充分享受俱乐部的所有新增休闲设施。

phrases.tran_cn: 当某人有自由时间时；在某人方便时
（经济独立或没有负担的）悠闲女士（或男士）
休闲中心；体育活动中心

trans.tran_cn: 空闲时间，闲暇，悠闲，安逸
trans.tran_en: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy
